Header: Former MP R. Duminda Silva donates financial aid to the family of a person who died from electrocution and 13 others who received injuries
Content: Financial aid was offered to the family of a person who died from electrocution as well as 13 others who received injuries while they were erecting a flag post for a Catholic Church festival at Wadullawatta area in Orugodawatta recently, under the patronage of former Colombo District MP R. Duminda Silva today. In addition, following the incident, the MP also visited the injured persons at Colombo National Hospital on the 27 th , as soon as he heard the news.
